column5: Our Marketing (International Marketing) MSc is designed for those seeking to develop their knowledge of global and multi-cultural marketing – positioning you for a career in a multinational organisation.On the course, you will learn both theory and practice of international marketing at an advanced level, providing you with an in-depth, critical understanding of research methodologies, and marketing planning and strategy.You will examine how cultural differences, new technologies and the rapid emergence of economies such as Brazil, Russia, China and India create both opportunities and challenges.Full-time students also have the option to add work experience to their Masters through a year’s paid placement in industry.
